plot: Two teams combining celebrities and members of the public represent different British cities as they take part in physical challenges at a specially built arena in St Helier on Jersey.
plot_en: Two teams combining celebrities and members of the public represent different British cities as they take part in physical challenges at a specially built arena in St Helier on Jersey.
plot_es: Two teams combining celebrities and members of the public represent different British cities as they take part in physical challenges at a specially built arena in St Helier on Jersey.
title: Simply the Best
